item.description:
Please join Crawl in Boston on 4/20/13 to tour the Faneuil Hall area. We’re excited to be bringing you our first ever Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Crawl. One of the most popular American cartoon icons is invading the city with a bar crawl that will not be soon forgotten. Costumes are mandatory! And while we expect Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael and Michelangelo will be the most popular costumes. There’s an entire list of other characters you can utilize as well. I have a special place in my heart for Bebop and Rocksteady.

Much more info at http://crawlinboston.com/tmnt/
item.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Bar Crawl
